ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p:
This work was supported by the intramural program of the
10.13039/100000060 NIAID
(TCP),
10.13039/100000002 NIH
contracts and grants (75N93019C00062 and R01 AI127828), and the
10.13039/100000185 Defense Advanced Research Project Agency
(HR001117S0019) to MSD. We are grateful to Dr. Barney Graham and Dr. Heather Hickman and to members of our laboratories for critical comments and assistance creating the figure.

sec.title: Declaration of Interests
sec.p: M.S.D. is a consultant for Inbios, Vir Biotechnology, and NGM Biopharmaceuticals, and is on the Scientific Advisory Board of Moderna. The Diamond laboratory at Washington University School of Medicine has received sponsored research agreements from Moderna.
